Hashimoto is one of the biggest city on JR Yokohama line and Keio Sagamihara line. Take JR Yokohama line in the direction of Hachioji or Keio Sagamihara line in the direction of Hashimoto. It takes about 14 minutes to get there from Machida station.

There are some shops like a bakery, book store, flower shops, stand shop, restaurants and Sony Plaza(Fancy shop)etc. The station is next to Izakaya(Japanese bar) building and big fashion building(mewe).
There is a cinema which named
and it takes about 7 minutes from JR Hashimoto station by walking.
Big fashion building "mewe" offers everybody to enjoy shopping.

value: Mister Donut, 3-28-1 Hasimoto Sagamihara-city(Under the JR station and inside mewe), ☎042-700-7568. 7:00-23:00.
